verbs.description: sec charges [V: bellbrook] [ARG0: man] [ARG2: with ‘ rob peter to pay paul’ scheme] sec charges former local investment advisor for misappropriation bellbrook john gregory schmidt sec us securities and exchange commission u s securities and exchange commission paul peter
